answers.answer: If the over use of the listerine was the problem I don't think it would isolate itself in the tongue. I think the other soft tissue of the mouth would be affected. It is possible that you have an allergy to alcohol, have that checked out. The last piece of advice would be to seek out an oral pathologist. You can locate them in a dental school or a teaching hospital. Have you seen an oral surgeon?
No I haven't seen a oral surgeon.So you don't think it has anything to do with HIV? I didn't know you could have an allergy to alcohol. Thanks for your quick response.
